definition[0]: to reduce the size of your army, navy etc, and the number of your weapons
example[0]: Getting the rebels to disarm will not be easy.
example[1]: Captured soldiers were disarmed and put into camps.
definition[2]: to make someone feel less angry or disapproving of you, and more friendly
example[2]: His tact and political skills disarmed his critics.
definition[3]: to take the explosives out of a bomb, missile etc
